PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2024-04842024-05-08PMO
ActPublic Service Employment Act
PrecisAppointment of ANDREW PIPE of Lennox and Addington County, Ontario, to be special adviser to the Minister of Sport and Physical Activity, to be known as Special Advisor, to hold office during pleasure for a term of eighteen months, on a part-time basis, effective May 9, 2024.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Appointment of ANDREW PIPE of Lennox and Addington County, Ontario, to be special adviser to the Minister of Sport and Physical Activity, to be known as Special Advisor, to hold office during pleasure for a term of eighteen months, on a part-time basis, effective May 9, 2024.
